pageAttributes.title: Become an apprentice
pageAttributes.summary: Find out how to become an apprentice, what apprenticeships are available and which employers offer them.

cards.title: Real stories
cards.metaDescription: Have a look at apprentices who've joined their chosen organisations and watch what they're doing and how becoming an apprentice has changed their career paths.
cards.summary: Find out how becoming an apprentice changes lives.

cards.title: What are the benefits of an apprenticeship?
cards.metaDescription: What are the benefits of an apprenticeship?
cards.summary: Apprenticeships are an exciting option - you get hands-on training and also the chance to put your skills into practice.

cards.title: Help shape their career
cards.metaDescription: Apprenticeships offer the chance to learn, earn and get a degree. As a parent, guardian or carer, you can support your child as they explore their options.
cards.summary: If you're a parent, guardian, carer or teacher of someone, you can help them find a career path that’s right for them.

cards.title: Browse by interest
cards.summary: Find out what type of apprenticeships you can expect in your chosen interest.

cards.title: Becoming an apprentice
cards.metaDescription: An apprenticeship gives you hands-on experience, a salary and the opportunity to train while you work as an apprentice.
cards.summary: An apprenticeship is a real job where you learn, gain experience and get paid. You're an employee with a contract of employment and holiday leave.

cards.title: Applying for an apprenticeship
cards.metaDescription: From finding the right apprenticeship and employer and how to write a good CV, covering letter and what to expect from the employer.
cards.summary: There are hundreds of different apprenticeships to choose from. To apply for one, you’ll need to create an account on the find an apprenticeship service. You can also save any apprenticeships you like and then apply for them later.

cards.title: The interview process
cards.metaDescription: From finding the right apprenticeship and employer to nailing the interview.
cards.summary: If your application is successful, the employer will invite you for an interview. If you’re upskilling with your current employer, you may not have one.

cards.title: Starting your apprenticeship
cards.metaDescription: Find out what's expected of you now you've secured your apprenticeship and what you should expect when you start.
cards.summary: Before you start your apprenticeship, your employer will usually contact you and ask a series of questions. Find out what they might be.

cards.title: Assessment and certification
cards.metaDescription: What to expect at the end of your apprenticeship and where you go next
cards.summary: During your apprenticeship, you’ll be assessed to make sure you’re achieving the knowledge, skills and behaviours needed for your chosen apprenticeship.

cards.title: Set up a service account
cards.summary: Create an account on find an apprenticeship so you can search, save and apply for apprenticeships.
